post.title: Please Cut My Hedges!
post.description: I would really like to have all my hedges the same height!!!

post.title: Remove Dead Grass
post.description: Need someone to remove all the dead grass on my lawn. Thanks in advance!

post.title: Need Help ASAP!
post.description: Hi there can someone come cut down this dead tree? It has been here for ages!

post.title: Need Fence Repair
post.description: After that big flood last week all my posts have shifted... Could use some help to reset all the posts, I'll pay well.

post.title: Need help for my lawn care
post.description: Just recently purchased this lot and the lawn really needs some work... can't do it all on my own!

post.title: Remove Old Plywood
post.description: After that recent hurricane I never had the time to take down all these plywoods covering my windows!

post.title: Remove Pesty Vines!
post.description: I need someone to come and remove all these vines off my new house.I am quite old and unable to do this myself, I will pay well.

post.title: See Photo... Overgrowth
post.description: I recently came back from vacation and the lawn and bushes have gone wild!!! Could really use someone to come by today and help take care of all this. Price is negotiable.

post.title: Remove Tree
post.description: Hi there, wanted to take a chance and post this here I have an old tree I need to have cut down. It is covering my house is shade and my plants are crying!!

post.title: Yard Work
post.description: Offering cash or e-transfer to work on my front yard. We can discuss the payment, need a lot of work done over here.

post.title: Remove old 4x4 Stairs
post.description: All of this wood has rotted through, Need all of this removed will pay well!

post.title: Hedges need shaping
post.description: All of my hedges are out of wack. Need someone to have fun and decorate these as best you can. Thank you!

post.title: Need Yard maintained before visit! ASAP
post.description: Need help today, offering a great price to come cut the grass and maintain the bushes. We have a surprise visit today to check out our rental property.

post.title: Remove Dead Wood
post.description: Need someone to come by and remove all this dead overgrowth. Hasn't been maintained, I have been out of the city on a business trip. Thanks, Matilda

post.title: Plant these new flowers I received as a gift
post.description: Hello, I am by no means a green thumb and could use someone experienced to properply plant all these plants I recently received.

post.title: Redo My Lawn
post.description: Hello, due to the recent heatwave all my lawn has died. Looking for someone to come by and replace all of it. I am paying well.

post.title: Make a garden
post.description: Recently I have noticed my yard and house looks bland. I want some beautiful colors infront of my house, THANKS!!

post.title: FIX MY FENCE
post.description: That massive windstorm from this week totally destroyed my fence! I need somone come by and help me repair all of this.

post.title: Remove Hay
post.description: I bought this wonderful farm but it has a few piles of hay I need to get rid of.

post.title: Remove Plywood and Cut Grass
post.description: Hello need someone to remove all these plywoods from the windows. New owner of building but don't have time to do this right now. Also need someone to cut the grass.

post.title: Remove all these vines!
post.description: I absolutely hate all of these vines can someone remove them for me?

post.title: Fix My Mailbox, Cut My Lawn
post.description: Was wondering if someone could come by and cut the lawn, at the same time if you have a screwdriver could you fix my mailbox? Thanks!

post.title: Maintain My Front Lawn
post.description: Well as you can probably tell... I'm a snowbird and my lawn is out of hand. Paying well for someone to cut it today!

post.title: Cut My Lawn
post.description: I can barely see my front door! Someone please cut my lawn, I don't own a lawnmower.
